title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Feb 26 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Feb 26 2022
description:
Clay and Buck broadcast from WJNO in West Palm Beach in prep for their Mar-a-Lago visit with President Trump on Tuesday. Weather is so beautiful, such a peaceful place, Clay suggests the Super Bowl be held in Florida. The New York Times admits the CDC lied, withheld covid data. Buck: "Clay, we could do the 'We Were Right' dance here." Clip goes viral: Virginia mom busts school board, brings receipts. School board member tries to silence the vocal mom and call for the police. Biden and Harris bungle diplomacy as Putin preps for war. Buck says he thinks Putin will invade. C&B take lively calls on Ukraine, CDC.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
